properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_ROOM( ROOM_NO, HOTEL_NO, ROOM_NAME, CHECKIN_TIME, CHECKOUT_TIME, ROOM_NUM, ROOM_PRICE, MAX_PEOPLE ) VALUES( SEQ_ROOM.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO TB_ROOM_IMG VALUES( SEQ_ROOM_IMG.NEXTVAL, SEQ_ROOM.CURRVAL, ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ROOM WHERE HOTEL_NO = ? AND ROOM_YN = 'Y'

SELECT TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO, ROOM_NAME, CHECKIN_TIME, CHECKOUT_TIME, ROOM_NUM, ROOM_PRICE, MAX_PEOPLE, ROOM_IMG, ROOM_IMG_NO FROM TB_ROOM JOIN TB_ROOM_IMG ON TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM_IMG.ROOM_NO JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO WHERE TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND ROOM_YN = 'Y' AND TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ?

SELECT ROOM_NAME, CHECKIN_TIME, CHECKOUT_TIME, ROOM_NUM, ROOM_PRICE, MAX_PEOPLE, ROOM_IMG, TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, ROOM_IMG_NO FROM TB_ROOM JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO JOIN TB_ROOM_IMG ON TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM_IMG.ROOM_NO WHERE TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND TB_ROOM.ROOM_YN = 'Y' AND TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO = ?
